subskills.DESCRIPTION: Sort rocks by observable properties (size, color, texture, weight)
Match weather conditions to appropriate weather symbols on a basic chart
Record daily weather patterns using simple pictographs for 5 consecutive days
Identify the four seasons and their characteristic weather patterns
Demonstrate how soil helps plants grow through simple planting experiments
Compare different types of soil using magnifying glasses (color, texture, particle size)
Create a model showing how rain flows downhill using sand and water
Identify living and nonliving components in a local ecosystem
Match animals to their appropriate habitats based on local landforms
Construct a simple model showing day and night using a flashlight and globe
Collect and categorize examples of natural versus human-made materials
Create a basic map showing major features of the school playground (trees, buildings, playground equipment)
